entities.description: Snape is described as a teacher who is strict and has black eyes. He is also shown to be agitated and snarling at Karkaroff.

entities.description: Karkaroff is described as a teacher who is worried and angry. He shows Snape something on his inner forearm, but it is not clear what it is.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a student who is clearing up his armadillo bile. He shows Snape the sodden rag he was holding, trying to appear innocent.
